snippet: While on the streets of the Wan Chai neighborhood, Grace Lam, a contributing fashion editor for Vogue China, shares her fun and edgy style icons: Bruce Lee, David Bowie and her colorblind mother.
abstract: Grace Lam, fashion stylist and contributing editor for Vogue China spotted in Hong Kong's Wan Chai neighborhood, describes her style influences.
lead_paragraph: While on the streets of the Wan Chai neighborhood, Grace Lam, a contributing fashion editor for Vogue China, shares her fun and edgy style icons: Bruce Lee, David Bowie and her colorblind mother.

headline.main: Wan Chai Style in Hong Kong
